Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Fade Off Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from on to off. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Minimum Light Level
Value.Help: Smallest dimming value permitted.

Value.label: Maximum Light Level
Value.Help: Largest dimming value permitted.

Value.label: Preset Light Level
Value.Help: The dimming level of the lights when turned from off to on via the switch. If the value of 0 is used, this means the restore dimming to the last dimming value.

Value.label: LED Dim Level Indicator Timeout
Value.Help: The length of time in seconds that the level indicators should stay illuminated after the dimming level is changed. A value of 0 means the indicator is always off, and a value of 255 means the indicators are always on.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Load Type
Value.Help: Specify the type of load that this dimmer controls.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: External switch action
Value.Help: Set external switch type.

Value.label: Fail-safe timeout
Value.Help: Set timeout period.

Value.label: Fail-safe command source node id
Value.Help: Configure Node ID number for Z-Wave command source.

Value.label: Fail-safe timeout action
Value.Help: Set relay output status if timeout period has been reached.

Value.label: Button #1 Programmable
Value.Help: Default Mode 0 The button on the Minimote uses the factory default functions for operation instead of any special functionality related to the below modes. Scene Mode 1 The button on the Minimote executes a scene from data received for Parameters Numbers 0-239 related to the button being pressed. Add Mode 2 The button on the Minimote is able to include/add devices into the Z-Wave network. Remove Mode 3 The button on the Minimote is able to remove devices from the Z-Wave network. Association Mode 4 The button on the Minimote is able to associate one device to another. Learn Mode 5 The button on the Minimote is able to allow the Minimote to be included into other Z-Wave networks and to learn Z-Wave network information.

Value.label: Mode
Value.Help: Enable selective Group Mode or Scene Mode when Button is in Use. NOTE: Minimote firmware 1.17 or higher is required, firmware 1.19 is highly recommended.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Motion Sensitivity
Value.Help: Adjust motion detection sensitivity. Lower number is for higher sensitivity, while higher number os for lower sensitivity. Defaults to 12.

Value.label: Trigger ON Duration
Value.Help: Set the duration you want the associated device to stay ON after being triggered by the sensor before it automatically turns OFF, in seconds.

Value.label: Trigger Action
Value.Help: Configure whether the Mini Sensor turns an associated device on or off when sending the BASIC_SET command. 0 is OFF, 255 is ON, and 1-99 is a percentage of light level. Value of 100-254 is NOT valid.

Value.label: Motion Detection
Value.Help: Enable or Disable motion detection.

Value.label: Light Trigger Level
Value.Help: Set light sensor as a secondary trigger for associated devices. If light level in a room falls beyond the set point and motion is detected, the Mini Sensor will send BASIC_SET command to associated devices to turn ON.

Value.label: Motion Trigger Interval
Value.Help: Adjust the time when motion is reported again after initial trigger, in seconds.

Value.label: Light Polling Interval
Value.Help: How often the Mini Sensor reports light level to the controller and associated devices, in seconds.

Value.label: Light Trigger
Value.Help: Enable/Disable the light sensor as secondary trigger.

Value.label: Light Report
Value.Help: Change required to report to the controller, in lux.

Value.label: LED Notification
Value.Help: Enable or Disable LED Notification.

Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.
